text: Wolf Henzler (born 5 April 1975) is a former German Porsche factory racing driver. He began racing in 1991 with a win in the German Junior Kart championship. Born in Nürtingen, Baden-Württemberg, he won one time the 24 Hours of Le Mans in 2010 in the GTE PRO category. His last major championship win was in the GT class of the 2013 Petit Le Mans. Wolf Henzler resides in Braselton, Georgia in the United States. ==Racing record== ===Complete International Formula 3000 results=== (key) (Races in bold indicate pole position; races in italics indicate fastest lap.) {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" !
